import React from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Checkout from '../components/Checkout' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return ( <>

Shippig

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

 ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
